title: Alphabet Olympics
description: Mastering the alphabet has never been so much fun! Bring your favorite young reader along for the ride as the Alphabet Olympics gets underway. From Baseball Batting Badgers and Kickball Kangaroos to Ping Pong Playing Pumas and Zip-Lining Zebras, children learn to master the sounds of early reading with easy-to-remember mascots and fun rhymes that serve as memorable building blocks for a lifetime of rewarding fun with books.
author: Michelle Stacey Sjodin
